Service for performing actions on Nodes.

Method Detail

startAction

public void startAction(Node node,
                        String taskId,
                        String service,
                        String action)
                 throws IOException
Start an action on a node. Updates the node in the persistent store.

Parameters:
node - Node the action will take place on.
taskId - Id of the task associated with the action.
service - Service the action is for or empty if its not a service action.
action - Action to execute on the node.
Throws:
IOException

completeAction

public void completeAction(Node node)
                    throws IOException
Complete an action on a node. Updates the node in the persistent store.

Parameters:
node - Node the completed action took place on.
Throws:
IOException

failAction

public void failAction(Node node,
                       String stdout,
                       String stderr)
                throws IOException
Fail an action on a node with optional logs on what went wrong. Updates the node in the persistent store.

Parameters:
node - Node the action failed on.
stdout - Stdout of failed action.
stderr - Stderr of failed action.
Throws:
IOException

createHostname

public static String createHostname(String clusterName,
                                    String clusterId,
                                    int nodeNum,
                                    String dnsSuffix)
Creates a unique hostname from the cluster name, cluster id, and node number. Hostnames are of the format -., with underscores and dots replaced by dashes, and with whole hostname trimmed to 255 characters if it would otherwise have been too long.

Parameters:
clusterName - Name of the cluster the node is a part of.
clusterId - Id of the cluster the node is a part of.
nodeNum - Number of the node in the cluster. Must be unique across the cluster.
dnsSuffix - DNS suffix to use.
Returns:
Unique hostname (at least across system managed nodes).
